attributes.title: Gave my pet skunk diarrhea
attributes.review: Similarly to all the other reviews, the app took ages to download and when it was finally installed, the screen turned an obnoxious orange. I was very surprised and confused and tried to turn off my phone. However, when I was able to turn off the phone, a mysterious voice started speaking through my phone speaker. It was yelling out racist remarks and said â€œfake newsâ€ whenever I tried to turn my phone off. As this was all happening my pet skunk, Lola, got frightened by the loud noise so she peed on my phone. The liquid was able to disable my phone but when that happened my phone suddenly expelled some orange gas and it smelled terrible. I quickly got my phone out in the backyard. My other skunk, Levi, then tried eating my phone. The gas got into his system and a few days later he got diarrhea. I have no idea how this app was able to control my phone as it did, but it was definitely unpleasant. -1000000000/10, would not recommend.

attributes.title: app is only good if you want to ruin your life
attributes.review: i got this app expecting a fantastic new way to support my outwardly racist president. what i received has me completely flabbergasted.
